front.title: BANdwidth Aggregation for interNet Access (BANANA) The Control Protocol of Bonding Tunnels

abstract.t: There is an emerging demand for solutions to bond multiple access links to provide subscribers with redundancy and load-sharing across these access links. BANdwidth Aggregation for interNet Access (BANANA) will specify such solutions. In this document, a control protocol is specified to deliver configuration and control information between two peering BANANA boxes.
